name: Sun's Out, Guns Out
description:
Sun's Out, Guns Out🔫

A tiny VR game, part of a series of 12 monthly games to be released throughout 2019! Made in around 5-6 days and inspired by Point Blank from PS1.

Use your VR controller to shoot a minigame to begin. Then, shoot the targets within the allotted time for maximum points! Pretty simple stuff.

NOTE: VR IS REQUIRED TO PLAY THIS GAME. IT HAS ONLY BEEN TESTED ON VIVE, BUT SHOULD WORK FINE ON OCULUS TOO. PLEASE CONSIDER CHECKING THE GAME WORKS ON YOUR SETUP BEFORE DONATING, TO AVOID DISAPPOINTMENT!

Controls (Vive)

Aim & Shoot: Right-hand VR controller movement & trigger

Toggle laser sight: Press side grip button(s)

Price

Would recommend downloading for free; it's only a quick prototype. Don't feel bad! However any donations would be very much appreciated and will win you a credit in future projects ;)
